Reviews.Title: Good unlocked cell phone with some flows
Reviews.Author: David Dvalishvili "happy man"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good looking and working unlocked cell phone but the keyboard is somewhat trobbelsome. Especially the "i" key that if you dont press it hard enough it does not make contact with the phone. Meaby changing the keyboard alltogether may help. Other then that I very happy with this refurbished cell phone. I will never buy a brand new phone anymore when you can get a refurbished for the third of the retail price

Reviews.Title: it only came just the phone by it self and the battery die easily
Reviews.Author: dety
Reviews.Content: i was expect the phone will come with the charger but it didnt, also the battery die easily,,,i definitely wont buy any electronics online anymore

Reviews.Title: brand new-box items are missing
Reviews.Author: Keshav Sharma
Reviews.Content: its brand new and working great, AT&T; is printed on handset but it is not available in AT&T; box, i receive only the mobile phone, and its charger in the boxing nothing else but i was expecting mobile phone, wall charger, usb data cable, leather cover and installation cd with user guide in the box but still i am happy because phone is brand new i have import this phone to india

Reviews.Title: wesaveyou$.
Reviews.Author: jexel daboin
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto lo recomiendo ampliamente, funciona muy bien operadora movistar en venezuela, llego en la fecha pautada, mi hijo esta feliz con el telef.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Mildred Garcia
Reviews.Content: the mobile was in perfect conditions and it works perfectly. very very happy with it. i strongly recommend it .
